Text: Possible call on Enron next spring trying to think ahead for the spring energy trip the week of April Do you think it would be possible for us to visit during that time Best regards Maureen Crandall Professor of Economics Industrial College of the Armed Forces National Defense University Fort McNair DC tel fax

ICAF to San Francisco week of April Cc Cynthia Sandherr said you were once again the person to write to We talked in the fall of when I was thinking about bringing the energy seminar to San Franciso in in our group this year really interested in gas and elec matters especially in CA students including a BGen from Croatia and faculty At this point I am trying to juggle between an open Monday afternoon April and a very early possible morning appt on Thursday am April We have asked CPUC to host us the afternoon of April but they may back out given the circumstances but for the moment that time is spoken for We did manage Alaska last year after all so now I am trying to resume the regular alternation between California and Houston I am several shades whiter of head as a result of bringing the Alaska trip to closure Draft schedule attached for your consideration of where we are in the planning process Best regards Maureen Crandall Professor of Economics Industrial College of the Armed Forces National Defense University Fort McNair DC tel fax IS dom trav Californiadoc

ICAF to San Francisco week of April Cynthia Sandherr said you were once again the person to write to We talked in the fall of when I was thinking about bringing the energy seminar to San Franciso in We did manage Alaska last year after all so now I am trying to resume the regular alternation between California and Houston I am several shades whiter of head as a result of bringing the Alaska trip to closure We did manage Alaska last year after all so now I am trying to resume the regular alternation between California and Houston I am several shades whiter of head as a result of bringing the Alaska trip to closure senior military and civilians in our group this year who are really interested in gas and electricity matters especially in CA students including a BGen from Croatia and faculty We would like to call on you and hear Enrons thoughts on gas and electricity matters both from a California perspective and from the point of datecertain national legislation At this point the time that looks best for us would be Monday afternoon April I am hoping this will be possible for you it will be just about years to the day since we last visited your California offices in the very first moments of electricity deregulation Draft schedule attached for your consideration of where we are in the planning process Best regards Maureen Crandall Professor of Economics Industrial College of the Armed Forces National Defense University Fort McNair DC tel fax IS dom trav Caldoc
